description: Create and delete snapshots images on volume groups for NetApp E-series storage arrays.

create_copy_pair_if_does_not_exist.description: Defines if a copy pair will be created if it does not exist.

search_volume_id.description: Searches for all valid potential target and source volumes that could be used in a copy_pair

api_url.description: The url to the SANtricity WebServices Proxy or embedded REST API, for example C(https://prod-1.wahoo.acme.com/devmgr/v2).

source_volume_id.description: The the id of the volume copy source.

api_password.description: The password to authenticate with the SANtricity WebServices Proxy or embedded REST API.

state.description: Whether the specified volume copy pair should exist or not.

volume_copy_pair_id.description: The the id of a given volume copy pair

destination_volume_id.description: The the id of the volume copy destination.

api_username.description: The username to authenticate with the SANtricity WebServices Proxy or embedded REST API.

start_stop_copy.description: starts a re-copy or stops a copy in progress
